title: Drawing, "Altar, Elevation and Part", ca. 1780–90
medium:
Pen and brown ink, gray wash, black chalk
Support: white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at lower left: Del[....] Filippo Marchionni;partially obliterated in graphite at lower left: Piancastelli, Mrs. Clar- ence Webster
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Clarence Webster (?); Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Altar, Elevation and Part", ca. 1780–90.
ca. 1780–90. Pen and brown ink, gray wash, black chalk
Support: white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-496.
